subject: junit process dies when calling ant
msgSnippet: Hello, I have a need to all an ant task in a JUnit test method. Here is how I call ant with all proper setup. org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(args); The ant
messageBody:
Hello, I have a need to all an ant task in a JUnit test method.

Here is how I call ant with all proper setup.

org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(args);

The ant call runs fine, but Junit process exits right after ant call.

JBuilder test runner shows the following message:

error reading test process

However other runners (text, swing) just die.

Any suggestion?

-Dan
